description:
Investigate and Fix Song Like Functionality

The like/favorite action for the currently playing song is not working correctly. When users attempt to like a song, a success toast notification appears, but the heart icon does not update to reflect the liked state.

Requirements:
- Identify why the heart icon is not filling in after like action
- Verify the like action is actually persisting to the backend/storage
- Ensure the UI state properly updates to show the filled heart icon
- Check if the issue occurs only for the current song or affects all songs
- Test the unlike functionality to ensure it also works correctly
- Verify the liked state persists after page refresh or app restart
- Ensure the toast notification only shows when the action truly succeeds

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Network failures during the like request
- Race conditions if user clicks multiple times quickly
- State sync between the like button and other UI elements showing liked songs
- Optimistic UI updates vs. actual backend confirmation
title: Fix song like button icon not updating on success
